# rl-epsilon-greedy

A minimal package implementing the epsilon-greedy strategy â€” a key concept in Reinforcement Learning (RL).

## Usage
```python
from rlepsilongreedy_colab import epsilon_greedy

action = epsilon_greedy([1.2, 3.4, 2.1], epsilon=0.1)
print('Selected action:', action)
```
